product_name: NRS Earl 6 Inflatable Stand Up Paddleboard - 10' 6"
long_description: There's always room in your garage, condo or car for an inflatable NRS paddleboard. This all-around stand up paddle board is great for fitness paddling, touring, river running and light surfing.
short_description: There's always room in your garage, condo or car for an inflatable NRS paddleboard. This all-around stand up paddle board is great for fitness paddling, touring, river running and light surfing.
